EmailTemplate.name: More Control Around Hyper-v with Turbonomic (1499351195.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: More Control Around Hyper-v with Turbonomic (1499351195.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Ed – Last time we spoke you mentioned that you were in the middle of installing Microsoft’s Hyper-V for your virtualization technology and mentioned around this time would be a better time for me to reach out. I was hoping that we could schedule a 30 minute conference call to discuss Turbonomic’s control platform and how our platform enables our Hyper-V customers to increase workload performance while also allowing them to increase the efficiency of their infrastructure. What most of my Hyper-V customers tell me is that they feel that Hyper-V environments are hard to control vs. the VMware environment that they might be used to, and Turbonomic alleviates this challenge by giving our customers control and insight into the environment. With this our customers are able to capitalize on the investment they made in virtualization and grow and scale at a lower costs. Do you have 30 minutes for an engineer and I to provide an introduction into how this is possible to you and the team at UAB? Based on our last conversation, I am confident you will find it valuable. Best, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>
